Trade/Device Name(s): ADVIA Chemistry Carbon Dioxide Liquid (CO2_L) Assay
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ADVIA Chemistry Carbon Dioxide Liquid (CO2_L) Assay for in vitro quantitative measurement of carbon dioxide in human serum and plasma using enzymatic methodology
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro diagnostic use in the quantitative determination of carbon dioxide in human serum and plasma on ADVIA Chemistry Systems to aid in the diagnosis and treatment of disorders associated with changes in acid-base balance
